select u.id, u.name from users u where u.del_flag = :delFlag and u.dept_id = :deptId
select u.id, u.name, u.user_id as userId from users u where u.del_flag = :delFlag and u.user_id = :userId

select u.id, u.name, u.birthday, ud.dept_id as deptId, d.dept_name as deptName from users u left join user_in_dept ud on u.id = ud.user_id left join department d on d.id = ud.dept_id where u.user_id = :name
select u.id, u.name, u.birthday, u.dept_id as deptId, d.dept_name as deptName from users u ,department d where d.id = u.dept_id and u.dept_id in ( :deptId)
update users u set u.email= :email where u.id= :id
